text: Thomas J. LaBonge (October 6, 1953 â€“ January 7, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. LaBonge was born in Los Angeles. He was a member of the Los Angeles City Council from 2001 to 2015. LaBonge died on January 7, 2021 from cardiac arrest in Los Angeles, aged 67.Tom LaBonge, former LA councilman and longtime fixture on local political scene, dies at 67 ABC.
